search.name: All Music Guide (AMG)
search.description:
Search the AMG for album reviews, track listings, artist discographies and more. Searches for artists by default.
Switches:
/song - Search for a specific song.
/album - Search for a specific album.
/style - Lookup the history of a particular music style.
/label - Lookup information on a major record label.
Examples:
alm The Beatles
alm Revolver /album
